name: e-shot
author: Forfront

sections.description:
Installing the e-shot™ plugin for WordPress enables you to add e-shot™ sign-up forms to your WordPress site, hassle free. Your website visitors will have a quick and simple way of subscribing to your mailing list or submitting other requests that can be accommodated by the marketing automation functions in e-shot™.
The plugin includes a form builder which allows you to capture a leads details when they fill out a form, this data is transferred immediately to your selected e-shot™ contact group(s).

Click here to find out more about e-shot or to book a demo of the platform.

What does it do?

How e-shot™ sign up forms can help grow your audience

  • Email sign up: Add customisable forms to your site, giving your visitors the opportunity to sign up to your coms. No coding required.*

  • Accurate segmentation: Build high-quality, permission based contact groups which can be used to send relevant and targeted content.

  • Automated response: Use the automation features to build a workflow to nurture your new subscriber once they have filled out the sign up form.

  • Spambot protection: Select between single or double opt-in methods to whittle out fake email addresses from being added to your contact groups.

Limitations

  • Global sign up forms not supported.

  • Boolean data types not supported.

  • Picklist data types not supported.
sections.installation: For further information and support on how to use the e-shot WordPress plugin, browse our How-to-guide.
